emissions.closest_match_explanation: For '1 kg hakket oksekød', the most appropriate match is 'oksekød, hakket, 5-10% fedt'. This is because the ingredient specifies 'hakket oksekød' (minced beef), and among the minced beef options, 'oksekød, hakket, 5-10% fedt' has the highest emission factor. This aligns with the principle of choosing the highest emission factor when multiple viable options have similar processing levels, ensuring a conservative estimate.

For '3 store løg', the best match is 'løg'. This is the most direct and least processed form of onion available in the database, aligning with the preference for less processed options when no specific processing is mentioned for the ingredient.
For '3 gulerødder', the most suitable match is 'gulerod'. This is the raw and least processed form of carrot, which is consistent with the ingredient description that does not specify any processing.

For '2.5 stilke bladselleri', the best match is 'bladselleri'. This is a direct and unprocessed match for the ingredient, aligning with the preference for the least processed option when no specific processing is mentioned.

For '6 fed hvidløg', the most appropriate match is 'hvidløg'. This is the raw and least processed form of garlic, which is consistent with the ingredient description that does not specify any processing.

For '150 g tomatkoncentrat', the best match is 'tomatpure, koncentreret'. This option directly corresponds to the 'koncentrat' (concentrate) aspect of the ingredient, indicating a processed form of tomato.

For '3 dåse hakkede tomater eller polpa', the most suitable match is 'tomat, flået, konserves'. This option directly reflects the 'dåse hakkede tomater' (canned chopped tomatoes) aspect of the ingredient, indicating a processed and canned form.
For '2 dl rødvin', the most direct and appropriate match is 'rødvin'. This is a direct match for the ingredient, which is a fermented product.

For 'Olie', 'olivenolie' is chosen as the best match. When multiple viable options exist for a general ingredient like 'Olie' and no specific type is mentioned, the option with the highest emission factor is selected to ensure a conservative estimate.
For 'Friskekværnet peber', the best match is 'peber, sort'. This is the most common and direct form of pepper used for grinding, aligning with the ingredient description.
For '1 håndfuld friske basilikumblade', the most suitable match is 'basilikum, frisk'. This directly corresponds to the 'friske' (fresh) aspect of the ingredient, indicating an unprocessed form.

For 'Pasta efter ønske', the most general and appropriate match is 'pasta'. This option represents a broad category that encompasses various types of pasta, aligning with the unspecified nature of the ingredient.
For 'Revet parmesan', the best match is 'parmesan ost, 32+'. This is a direct and specific match for the ingredient, as 'revet parmesan' refers to grated parmesan cheese.
